description: Review `package.json` to understand dependencies, and scripts for running, testing, and debugging the application.
Set up the local environment, including the creation of a `.env` file based on `.env.example`.
Install all project dependencies using `npm install`.
Run the application using the appropriate `npm` script.
Analyze the database schema and data to ensure consistency and correctness.
Test all API endpoints for proper functionality and error handling.
Review and test the user authentication flow.
Examine and validate the functionality of the main application features (Invoices, Customers, etc.).
Review the frontend components and their interaction with the backend.
Analyze the deployment configuration and ensure it's set up correctly.
